name: Army Extreme Car Driving 3D
description:
Army Extreme Car Driving 3D is the best car simulator of 2015, thanks to its advanced realistic physics engine you get the feeling what it takes to drive around with different sports cars. So if you ever wanted to try a sports car simulator game with a twist then download Army Extreme Car Driving 3D, this game will let you be one of the boys and girls of the army so its time to set up the city defense and start chasing those thugs and riot makers on the street

Become a furious racer on the city streets, it's a big open world. There is more than enough to do. Drive in the insane looking army vehicles, smash your way as you dive into the world of criminal car cases, sometimes on foot. So start pulling people over in your mighty army cars and vehicles. If you like the police games that are on the google play store you will like Army Extreme Car Driving 3D for sure. if you like simulator games, drifting and just smashing your car then try this newest simulator game with realistic auto physics. Test your insane racing skills

What makes this a Car Driving Extreme Simulator game is the amount of different cars and vehicles you can choose.The endless amount of missions you can undertake And that is what makes this the best Extreme Car Driving 2015 game for sure.

Close the criminal case and lock those bad guys behind bars as fast as possible.

Army Extreme Driving 3D game features
- Good arcade style steering
- Day and Night time driving
- Earn cash and points during police pursuits
- Show your driving skills and don’t get shaking off
- Build up your own car collection of unique and rare cop cars in this extreme car simulator 3D game
- Army Extreme Police chase car racing action with one of the best racing physics on google play store today
